translations are a little tricky with a statically generated site if you imagine

don't know 100 pages and you're supporting 20 30 languages it quickly
bubbles up and every time you make a change whether in translation or content

it gets pretty tricky for us we right now our page size is pretty small we
were only other handful of sizes we're supporting many languages this is an
area that I want to dig into a little bit more there are other creative
solutions SmartLink is a translation service they offer
something called a gdn it's basically a translation proxy where you're not

like that you only ever have to really deal with your English translated
content and then the rest gets translated to set up we have today is we
have we're using the smart Lang github and contentful connectors what these
connectors do is that anytime content updates in content focus Stanfill itself
has localization support it triggers a web hook in SmartLink smart legos and
grabs the strings automatically same thing in github but it's monitoring your

and just to highlight some a few other systems internally that have been

it's good good time to reevaluate it's hard to you know throw out
